title: Slayer task/Sea snakes

properties.name: description
properties.value:
Sea snakes can be assigned as a slayer task at level 40 Slayer, level 50 combat and completion of Royal Trouble by Vannaka.
They are found in the Miscellania and Etceteria Dungeon, which can be entered during and after the Royal Trouble quest. They attack with melee and are poisonous so antipoisons of any variety are strongly recommended. They share the same drop table although the hatchling drop regular bones, whereas the young drop big bones (and by extension longs and curved bones).

Sea snakes

Advanced data
Icon ID5089

Sea snakes can be assigned as a slayer task at level 40 Slayer, level 50 combat and completion of Royal Trouble by Vannaka. They are found in the Miscellania and Etceteria Dungeon, which can be entered during and after the Royal Trouble quest. They attack with melee and are poisonous so antipoisons of any variety are strongly recommended. They share the same drop table although the hatchling drop regular bones, whereas the young drop big bones (and by extension longs and curved bones).

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Sea snake hatchling 62 50
  • Miscellania and Etceteria Dungeon
  • Weakest version of sea snake. Occupies 1x1 square. Can induce poison beginning at 5.
Sea snake young 90 85
  • Miscellania and Etceteria Dungeon
  • Stronger version of sea snake. Occupies 2x2 square. Can induce poison beginning at 7.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespotable Notes
Miscellania and Etceteria Dungeon 10 Young, 7 Hatchlings No Yes Yes
  • Only location
